QuestData.Title: Orientation: Dragonscale Basecamp
QuestData.Description:
Welcome to basecamp, $p.
It took Toddy and me awhile to settle on the perfect site to establish camp, but I couldn't be happier with our selection.
Easy access to ruins, proto-dragon breeding grounds, and of course the dragonflights.
Why not take a few minutes to explore the camp and meet some of the suppliers helping to fuel the expedition?
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet the important suppliers in the Dragonscale Basecamp.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Toddy Whiskers in the Dragonscale Basecamp tent.
QuestData.RewardText:
Met me Granpap, did ye?
Well, don't believe all his stories... He loves to brag about the family!
